io.spire.api
Class Subscription

java.lang.Object
  io.spire.api.Resource
      io.spire.api.Subscription

public class Subscription
extends Resource

A subscription resources makes it easy to check messages on one or more channels

Since:
1.0

static class Subscription.Subscriptions
          Describes a Collection of Subscription The subscriptions resource allows you to create new subscriptions
